title: FPIs dump Indian finance stocks to meet redemption pressure - Economic Times
content: FPIs dump Indian finance stocks to meet redemption pressure  Economic Times
description: ​​Overseas investors, which constitute about one-fifth of India’s total market capitalization, sold Indian equities worth $ 8.4 billion (Rs 64,000 crore) between February 15 and March 15, 2022. This was bigger than the outflow of $ 8.3 billion in March 2020.
